java.util

Class XMLUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.XMLUtils

  •  class XMLUtils
extends Object
    A class used to aid in Properties load and save in XML. Keeping this code outside of Properties helps reduce the number of classes loaded when Properties is loaded.
    Since:
    1.3
    Author:
    Michael McCloskey
